content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment for your living needs. How much were you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and effort in showing me this apartment. Regarding the rent, I'm looking to pay a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you please provide me with your initial asking price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. I believe the apartment is worth its weight in gold, considering its prime location in the heart of Magdeburg. My initial asking price is €900 per month, which I believe is more than fair for what the apartment offers. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the asking price, Mister Schmidt. I will need some time to consider it and discuss it with my financial advisor. Would it be possible to get back to you by tomorrow with my decision?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Absolutely, Max. Take all the time you need to make an informed decision. I look forward to hearing from you tomorrow. If you have any further questions or need more information, feel free to contact me. Good day to you!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will get back to you by tomorrow. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
